title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. All our bikes are designed for best-in-class weight and ride quality.We Deliver Nationwide! text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Full QC check and service undergone prior to delivery.Packaging: All bikes are securely boxed and packaged to avoid any damages in transit.Race Ready: Bikes are delivered “race ready” meaning you simply have to fit the front wheel, seat post and pedals and there you go – Riding!Trading hours: Monday to Friday 08h00 – 18h00 Saturday 08h00 to 14h00 Contact us: Tel: (021) 556 8207 or hanber@cycleteknix.co.za or WhatsApp 084 550 1353Address: 145 Blaauwberg Road, Table View, Cape Town, 7441.Website: View our website for more great specials: www.cycleteknix.co.zaItems Available: 1Address: 145 Blaauwberg Rd, Table View, Cape Town, 7441

title: Mongoose Downhill Boot R
text: Mongoose Downhill Boot R Large  frame Bike in good condition The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike is a downhill terrain for a pure riding experience that will give you a thrill. Mongoose built this bike with a Tectonic T2 Aluminium frame which is reliably durable yet lightweight and is equipped with internal cable routing and Free Floating Technology Suspension. The floating Coil Deluxe Rear Shock with 200mm of travel and RockShox Boxxer Fork with 200mm travel form a formidable duo which is extremely capable on intense downhill tracks.When you're rolling with all of that speed the Tektro Slate T4 Hydraulic Disc Brakes will give you the braking power you need to ride with control. The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike has the versatility to excel on technical downhill trails and still offer an incredibly capable ride on any trail.

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque.

range significantly.

parameter setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe

for its application.

traction on any surface.

title: Raleigh 26" Eclipse Mens MTB
text:
Raleigh 26" Mountain Bike for sale. Almost brand new - used once! (no longer needed) Selling for R1,200.00. Price includes added extras such as Raleigh Alloy Bottle Holder valued at R69.00 and Raleigh Gel Saddle valued at R199.00 
For collection in Brackenfell. Decals (stickers) were removed for personal preference. 

"The Raleigh 26inch mountain bike with fixed fork, 21 speed bicycles to assist with uphill’s and downhills, the durable aluminium rims make for a comfortable cycling experience while the front and rear steel V-brake system ensures safe and effective braking system.

If you are looking to get out on trails with friends or just want to take the kids out on the weekend, then this mountain bike is perfect. The Eclipse has high quality components to ensure that you can put your trust in your bike whilst off riding on road or off the beaten track.

Ideal for children between the ages 15 upwards
Enjoyment while cycling and learning confidence while riding
Adjustable for seat."

text:
ETRIKE
R54,850.00 VAT Inclusive and Delivery in SA. Finance
Available

 

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque.

Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

Free delivery in South Africa

Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

sizes: M (55-59), L (59-61)

weight: 280 g (size M)

title: Raleigh Chunky Boys Fat Bike
text:
Retail price when new was R2800, the new replacement model (Duke) is nearly R5000

20 inch size for boys around 10 to 12
6 speed

The good: 
The bike is in working condition.
Disc brakes are adjusted and working.
Gears adjusted and selecting every gear.
The fat tyres have no leaks and have good life still. 
Ideal for sand and mud riding. 


The bad:
Very minor surface rust on handlebars and seat post.
Will 100% pass stab with screwdriver test, no flaking rust. 
Handlebar Grips need to be replaced. 
Chain has been neglected but is still serviceable. 
Brake Pads near the end of service.
Will need tlc like any bike. 

Best for those that are hands-on DIY
